data.lyric:
[ti:One Beer(HARDY feat. Lauren Alaina, Devin Dawson)]
[ar:HIXTAPE/Hardy/Lauren Alaina/Devin Dawson]
[al:HIXTAPE: Vol. 1]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ONE BEER(feat. Lauren Alaina & Devin Dawson) - HARDY/Lauren Alaina (劳伦·阿莱娜)/Devin Dawson
[00:01.17]Lyrics by：Michael Hardy/Hillary Lindsey/Jake Mitchell
[00:02.35]We're seventeen in this small town
[00:04.82]Weak knees in a CVS
[00:07.33]Door locked in the bathroom
[00:09.61]What's it gonna be waitin' on that test
[00:12.52]Never thought that they'd be
[00:14.96]Puttin' those life plans on the shelf
[00:17.62]A couple American babies raisin' one up their self
[00:22.01]One beer turns into a lit cigarette
[00:24.66]Burnin' into a two beer buzz
[00:27.00]Three beers turns into five and six
[00:29.55]Then a love drunk kiss in the back of that truck
[00:32.34]Just like that everything rearranges
[00:34.86]Life changes out of the blue
[00:37.36]It's just a bud light but ain't it funny
[00:39.92]What one beer can turn into
[00:48.36]Sesame Street on the TV
[00:50.86]A race car rollin' on a cardboard bridge
[00:53.50]Crayon stick figure family
[00:55.94]Stuck right there front center on the fridge
[00:59.03]Flash back to two pink lines
[01:01.35]A whole bunch of prayin' and doubtin'
[01:03.72]Felt like the end of the world
[01:05.66]Now the world don't spin without 'em hey yeah
[01:08.29]Oh 'cause
[01:08.93]One beer turns into a lit cigarette
[01:11.00]Burnin' into a two beer buzz
[01:13.44]Three beers turns into five and six
[01:15.91]Then a love drunk kiss in the back of that truck
[01:18.21]In the back of that truck
[01:19.16]Just like that everything rearranges
[01:21.21]Life changes out of the blue
[01:23.83]It's just a Bud Light but ain't it funny
[01:26.45]What one beer can turn into
[01:34.05]A boy and a girl and a three on the tree
[01:36.95]K-I-S-S-I-N-G
[01:39.28]First comes lust then the shotgun marriage
[01:41.85]Six months later come a baby in a carriage
[01:44.58]You know what y'all You know what y'all
[01:47.01]The whole thing started with some alcohol
[01:52.27]The whole thing started with some alcohol hey yeah
[01:55.28]One beer turns into a lit cigarette
[01:57.40]Burnin' into a two beer buzz
[01:59.89]Three beers turns into five and six
[02:02.30]Then a love drunk kiss in the back of that truck
[02:05.11]Just like that everything rearranges
[02:07.47]Life changes out of the blue
[02:10.28]It's just a Bud Light but ain't it funny
[02:12.91]What one beer can turn into
[02:15.79]A boy and a girl and a three on the tree
[02:18.37]K-I-S-S-I-N-G oh
[02:20.66]First comes lust then the shotgun marriage
[02:23.12]Six months later come a baby in a carriage
[02:25.86]That's not all nah that's not all nah
[02:28.37]Here we go again drinkin' alcohol yeah
data.trans:
[ti:One Beer(HARDY feat. Lauren Alaina, Devin Dawson)]
[ar:HIXTAPE/Hardy/Lauren Alaina/Devin Dawson]
[al:HIXTAPE: Vol. 1]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.17]//
[00:02.35]我们十七岁 住在这座小城里
[00:04.82]瘫坐在药店厕所里
[00:07.33]门紧紧锁着
[00:09.61]测试结果会是什么呢
[00:12.52]谁会想到
[00:14.96]人生规划都得束之高阁
[00:17.62]两个美国孩子即将养育自己的孩子
[00:22.01]一杯啤酒 然后又点燃一支烟
[00:24.66]燃尽之后 再来两杯啤酒
[00:27.00]三倍啤酒下肚 接着第五杯 第六杯
[00:29.55]然后醉意之中 在车后座上亲吻
[00:32.34]就像那样 一切都改变了
[00:34.86]人生突然发生翻天覆地的变化
[00:37.36]那不过是一杯百威淡啤 但结果却并不有趣
[00:39.92]一杯啤酒能造成什么后果
[00:48.36]电视上播放着《芝麻街》
[00:50.86]玩具赛车在纸板桥上行进
[00:53.50]蜡笔画的全家福
[00:55.94]就贴在冰箱门的正中间
[00:59.03]记忆闪回到当初看到两条红线的情景
[01:01.35]一直不停地祈祷 然后又是不断地怀疑
[01:03.72]感觉世界末日了一样
[01:05.66]如今我的世界没有他们就无法转动
[01:08.29]因为

[01:13.44]三倍啤酒下肚 接着第五杯 第六杯
[01:15.91]然后醉意之中 在车后座上亲吻
[01:18.21]在车后座上

[01:21.21]人生突然发生翻天覆地的变化
[01:23.83]那不过是一杯百威淡啤 但结果却并不有趣
[01:26.45]一杯啤酒能造成什么后果
[01:34.05]一个男孩 一个女孩 在三档变速的汽车里
[01:36.95]亲吻着
[01:39.28]一开始是欲望作祟 然后就是奉子成婚
[01:41.85]六个月以后 我们的世界多了一个婴儿
[01:44.58]你们知道吗 各位 你们知道吗 各位
[01:47.01]整件事会发展到这一步 都是因为酒
[01:52.27]整件事会发展到这一步 都是因为酒

[02:18.37]亲吻着
